title: “Falling” to Premiere Tomorrow with Adesua Etomi, Blossom Chukwujekwu & Kunle Remi | Watch the Trailer
content: We watch many trailers. Some good and some make you add the movie to your “must see” list. “Falling” belongs to the latter category. “Falling” was produced by Uduak Isong Oguamanam. The movie stars Adesua Etomi, Blossom Chukwujekwu and Kunle Remi alongside Desmond Elliot, Deyemi Okanlawon, Tamara Eteimoh and Kofi Adjorlolo. Directed by Niyi Akinmolayan, “Falling” tells […]
